name: DelineaDSV
description: Retrieves secrets from Delinea DevOps Secrets Vault
author: Delinea
instanceNameFormat: Retrieve $(SecretPath) from Delinea DevOps Secrets Vault

inputs.name: ServerUrl
inputs.label: DevOps Secrets Vault URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the URL for your DevOps Secrets Vault.

validation.message: That does not appear to be a valid url.

inputs.name: ClientId
inputs.label: Client Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter your DevOps Secrets Vault client id.

inputs.name: ClientSecret
inputs.label: Client Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter your DevOps Secrets Vault client secret.

inputs.name: SecretPath
inputs.label: Secret Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the relative path to your secret.

inputs.name: DataFilter
inputs.label: Data Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of data keys or leave * to download all key/values from your secret data.

inputs.name: VariablePrefix
inputs.label: Variable Prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: Variable prefix which is applied to all data keys when storing the data values in the environment.

validation.message: Your variable prefix must start with a letter and may only contain letters, numbers and/or underscores.
